mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve font readability and button size on mobile devices to enhance touch usability.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and leverage browser caching to improve loading speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more keyword-rich content and meta tags for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Consider simplifying the navigation for quicker access to key pages.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps and providing clearer calls to action.
tips: Enhance mobile responsiveness by improving touch-target sizes and ensuring smooth navigation on smaller screens.
Improve loading speed by optimizing media files and utilizing a content delivery network (CDN).
Focus on enhancing SEO by including more relevant keywords and ensuring metadata is optimized.
Simplify user experience by reducing unnecessary pop-ups and ensuring intuitive site navigation.
Enhance booking flow by providing clear next steps and minimizing form fields.
